Function Documentation

void genChirpData ( ObjectDetection_Test_SubFrameParams *  subFrameParams,
genFrameStruc_t *  frm,
uint8_t *  outputBuffer,
uint16_t  numChirps,
ANTDEF_AntGeometry *  antDef 
)

Function Name : genChirpData.

Description : Generates one chirp of reference data into adc buffer. Function is called per chirp.
Parameters
[in]subFrameParamsPointer to sub-frame parameters structure
[in]frmPointer to frame reference data structure
[out]outputBufferPointer to buffer with generated samples. The samples are stored in cmplx16ImRe_t format.
[in]numChirpsNumber of Chirps
[in]antDefPointer to antenna geometry definition.
Returns
void
void initFrameData ( ObjectDetection_Test_SubFrameParams *  subFrameParams,
genFrameStruc_t *  genFrmDataObj,
sceneConfig_t *  sceneConfig 
)

Function Name : initFrameData.

Description : Initializes radar ADC reference data.
Parameters
[in]subFrameParamsPointer to sub-frame parameters structure
[out]genFrmDataObjPointer to frame reference data
[in]sceneConfigPointer to scene configuration
Returns
void
